main event: A civilian witness reported observing a bluish-green haze with no material body circling Union Lake, Michigan six times at high speed.
interesting points: The object was described as fairly large and required 69 seconds to complete an orbit around the city., The observer was a licensed aircraft pilot who confirmed the sighting., The object moved in a constant east direction., The observer was positive that the object was not a reflection., No physical evidence or photographs were presented with the report.
sighted object: bluish-green haze with no material body
